        public boolean move(Link link,
           Host host,
           com.liferay.portal.model.User user,
           boolean respectFrontEndRoles)
             throws DotSecurityException,
                    DotDataException
        Description copied from interface: MenuLinkAPI
        Moves the link to the specified host
        Specified by:
        move in interface MenuLinkAPI
        Parameters:
        link - link to move
        host - target host
        user - user to check permissions on
        respectFrontEndRoles - check for anonymous role permissions
        Returns:
        if the link were moved. mostly if didn't existing in the target host
        Throws:
        DotSecurityException - data related exceptions
        DotDataException - if permission denied
